notes.content: Record the outcome of the outbound call attempt
The scenario is configured to halt execution on HTTP errors to prevent silent failures.
Construct the request payload required to initiate a new emergency outbound call via Retell AI.
Persist the incremented call attempt count to the data store.
Increment the call attempt counter for tracking and enforcement of retry limits.

Introduce a controlled delay before re-attempting contact.

This avoids immediate repeated calls and provides time for prior attempts to complete.
The router evaluates the retrieved call record and determines whether the scenario should continue retrying or terminate execution.
Retrieve the previously stored intake call record in order to evaluate retry conditions.
Initiates a retry evaluation cycle for a specific intake incident.
